title: Implement lease renewal, release, and force-evict operations
description:
Implement lease renewal (extend TTL or update heartbeat), release (explicit), and force-evict (admin) operations. All operations append to log and update index under lock. Verify ownership for renew/release.

## Renewal Behavior
- Finite leases (ttl_secs > 0): extend `expires_at` by TTL
- Indefinite leases (ttl_secs = 0): update `last_beat` timestamp via heartbeat operation

See design doc section "Lease Operations".
